def_cn: （按照规定或法律）必须履行的，强制性的
def_en: If something is obligatory, you must do it because of a rule or a law.

def_cn: 习惯性的;礼节性的;随大溜的
def_en: If you describe something as obligatory, you mean that it is done from habit or custom and not because the person involved has thought carefully about it or really means it.
